item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "If you're not careful, the newspapers will have you hating the people who are being oppressed, and loving the people who are doing the oppressing." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "A wise man can play the part of a clown, but a clown can't play the part of a wise man." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "Hence I have no mercy or compassion in me for a society that will crush people, and then penalize them for not being able to stand up under the weight." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "Truth is on the side of the oppressed." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "I think that an objective reader may see how in the society to which I was exposed as a black youth here in America, for me to wind up in a prison was really just about inevitable. It happens to so many thousands of black youth." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "I'm for truth, no matter who tells it. I'm for justice, no matter who it's for or against." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "Time is on the side of the oppressed today, it's against the oppressor. Truth is on the side of the oppressed today, it's against the oppressor. You don't need anything else." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them." -- Confucius

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Herbert Hoover
item.description: "Older men declare war. But it is youth that must fight and die." -- Herbert Hoover

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Kamal.martin add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Love is the answer, but while you are waiting for the answer, sex raises some pretty good questions." -- Woody Allen
